owner.description: Owner of this workspace (applied as ws.kloudkit.com/owner global label).

project.description: Project this workspace belongs to (applied as ws.kloudkit.com/project global label).

labels.description: Additional labels applied to all chart resources.

annotations.description: Additional annotations applied to all chart resources.

timezone.description: IANA timezone for the workspace (sets the TZ environment variable).

additional_insecure_gpg_keys.description: List of trusted GPG pairs *(HTTP or insecure HTTPS)*.

additional_packages.description: Additional APT packages installed during startup.

disable_repos.description: Disables specified APT repositories or all repositories.

update_cache.description: Forces `apt-get update` before any package action.

password_hashed.description: Argon2 hash used for web login.

additional_cert_endpoints.description: URLs of additional CA certificates to trust *(HTTPS only)*.

additional_cert_insecure_endpoints.description: URLs of additional CA certificates to trust *(HTTP or insecure HTTPS)*.

additional_vs_extensions.description: Installs these Marketplace extension IDs at startup.

additional_vs_extensions_dir.description: Installs `.vsix` file found in this directory.

comments_disable_font.description: Disables the custom font used for code comments.

settings_merge.description: JSON object to deep merge into VSCode `settings.json`.

settings_merge_file.description: Path to a JSON file to deep merge into VSCode `settings.json`.

settings_override.description: JSON object to completely replace VSCode settings.json.

settings_override_file.description: Path to a JSON file to completely replace VSCode `settings.json`.

dir.description: Directory path where additional features are located.

store_url.description: URL of a ws-feature-store instance used as a local mirror.

clear_notebook_output.description: Clears outputs from Jupyter notebooks during git operations.

clone_repo.description: Clones this repository into `${WS_SERVER_ROOT}` at startup.

dir.description: Base directory for all workspace logs.

collectors.description: Comma-separated list of metric collectors to enable.

port.description: Port on which the metrics endpoint listens.

master_key.description: Master encryption key for secrets vault.

master_key_file.description: Path to file containing the master encryption key.

vault.description: Path to the secrets vault file.

port.description: Port on which the web server listens.

proxy_domain.description: Domain suffix used to expose server's forwarded ports.

ssl_cert.description: Path or inline PEM for the server certificate.

ssl_hosts.description: Space-delimited DNS names for self-signed certificate.

ssl_key.description: Path or inline PEM for the private key.

fail_on_error.description: Fail fast if any startup script exits non-zero.

prompt_hide_docker_context.description: Hides Docker context info in the prompt.

prompt_hide_hostname.description: Hides the container hostname in the prompt.

prompt_hide_kubernetes_context.description: Hides current Kubernetes context in the prompt.

prompt_hide_nodejs_version.description: Hides active Node.js version in the prompt.

prompt_hide_python_version.description: Hides active Python version in the prompt.

prompt_hide_user.description: Hides the current user in the prompt.

fzf_history_args.description: Default arguments passed to `fzf` for history search.

fzf_history_bind.description: Key binding that triggers fzf history search.

fzf_history_dates_in_search.description: Includes ISO 8601 date timestamps in search results.

fzf_history_end_of_line.description: Moves cursor to end-of-line after selecting a history entry.

fzf_history_event_numbers.description: Shows event numbers in history search results.

fzf_history_extra_args.description: Additional arguments appended to the default `fzf` arguments.

fzf_history_query_prefix.description: Prefix prepended to the fzf query when the buffer is non-empty.

fzf_history_remove_duplicates.description: Removes duplicate entries from history search results.
